meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of reptiles.
meanings.sent1: The scaly skin of the reptilians helps them regulate their body temperature.
meanings.sent2: The zookeeper studied the reptilians to learn more about their behavior.
meanings.sent3: The reptilians at the pet store were having a heated discussion about the best basking spot.
meanings.sent4: Her cold, reptilians stare made him feel like he was being watched by a predator.
meanings.sent5: The reptilians' unique ability to shed their skin fascinated the biology students.

meanings.definition: A group of reptiles, especially those believed by some to be shape-shifting aliens.
meanings.sent1: The conspiracy theorist claimed to have seen a group of reptilians disguised as humans.
meanings.sent2: The documentary explored the myth of reptilians living among us.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, everyone joked that the reptilians had the best disguises.
meanings.sent4: The politician's opponents accused him of being a reptilian in disguise, trying to control the government.
meanings.sent5: In the sci-fi novel, the reptilians from outer space were portrayed as powerful and mysterious beings.
